name: Engineering
description: Responsible for product development, software architecture, and technical innovation. Our engineering team builds and maintains all core platform features.

name: Design
description: Creates user-centered designs and experiences across all digital touchpoints. Focuses on usability, accessibility, and brand consistency.

name: Marketing
description: Drives brand awareness, lead generation, and customer acquisition through digital marketing, content strategy, and market research.

name: Human Resources
description: Manages talent acquisition, employee relations, benefits administration, and organizational development initiatives.

name: Sales
description: Responsible for revenue generation, client relationships, and business development. Works closely with marketing to convert leads into customers.
